title: Fiscal Consolidation Narrative Shocks Schema
description: Schema for the annual narrative fiscal consolidation dataset for Sub‑Saharan Africa

year.description: Calendar year of the fiscal consolidation episode

tax.description: Size of tax‑based consolidation in percent of GDP; positive for consolidation episodes, zero if no action

spend.description: Size of spending‑based consolidation in percent of GDP; positive for consolidation episodes, zero if no action

total.description: Total size of consolidation (tax + spend) in percent of GDP
